title: Font Size
description: Defines the size of the characters displayed on the screen

title: Font Weight
description: Defines the thinness or thickness of the characters

title: Font Family
description: The font-family property specifies the font for an element

title: Font Colour
description: Sets the colour of a character depending on the value given

title: Responsive Font
description: The font size will change depending on the size of the screen
